db.description: Key responsibilities of an instructor include: preparing and presenting lectures and developing course outlines and curriculum.\r\n- Preparing additional study materials for learners; providing ongoing support, guidance, and advice to learners; participating in curriculum and program reviews; and liaising with relevant industry sectors. Responsibilities also include evaluation and grading, maintenance and supervision of the classroom/kitchen, administering written and practical tests, and creating a positive learning environment.\r\n
db.requirement:
- Excellent communicate in English, specially love cooking.
- Professional culinary training or experience working in the food industry. We welcome qualified chefs from restaurants and hotels, instructors and students from hotel & restaurant management schools.
- Comfortable speaking in front of groups (average class size is 10 participants).
- Willingness to be trained on Cooking Matters, to work as a team with volunteer nutrition educator, and to adhere to program policies and team decisions.
db.benefit: - International & professional working environment. \r\n- Good salary and benefit from company. \r\n
db.keyword: Tinh thần làm việc nhóm,Kỹ năng chăm sóc khách hàng,Giao tiếp hiệu quả
